data.name: 0000 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I decided to go together with Nagato to get the key to the music room.

data.name: 0001 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hopefully we'll be able to borrow it smoothly.

data.name: 0002 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: From the teachers' point of view, we're the sole literature club member and...

data.name: 0003 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...a little extra (me) after all.

data.name: 0004 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It'll be a pain if they find us suspicious and start asking us this and that.

data.name: 0005 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: No problem. There is a easy method for borrowing it.

data.name: 0006 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hm? Is there?

data.name: 0007 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato gave a millimeter precise head movement as a sign of affirmation.

data.name: 0008 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What should we do, Nagato?

data.name: 0009 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: It's simple.

data.name: 0010 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That's all she said before walking into the staff room with such light gait that...

data.name: 0011 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...she seemed to be ignoring gravity.

data.name: 0013 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: A little later, Nagato leisurely appeared from the door to the staff room.

data.name: 0014 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As she arrived, she presented me with a single sheet of paper.

data.name: 0015 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Here.

data.name: 0016 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hm? What's this paper?

data.name: 0017 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Let's see... Application for use of school facilities?

data.name: 0018 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Umm, you want me to fill this in?

data.name: 0019 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Yes.

data.name: 0020 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I see, so we needed to fill in a form to use a room?

data.name: 0021 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's a surprisingly direct method of attack for Nagato.

data.name: 0022 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: If we can borrow it through the official process, there's no problem at all.

data.name: 0023 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I guess that's right.

data.name: 0024 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, I guess we have to make up some decent reason so as to not draw suspicion...

data.name: 0025 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato, we just need to hand this to the teacher on duty, right?

data.name: 0026 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Once again Nagato gave a slight movement, but...

data.name: 0028 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Is there something else?

data.name: 0029 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I can't help but notice Nagato's almost robotic-looking eyes.

data.name: 0030 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato, is something wrong?

data.name: 0031 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …Do you need another sheet?

data.name: 0032 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato was holding what looked like another application form.

data.name: 0033 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ah, well I suppose I might as well take it.

data.name: 0034 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Yes.

data.name: 0035 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato handed me the application form.

data.name: 0036 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A spare application form, huh…

data.name: 0037 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: This could come in handy at some point.

data.name: 0038 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nah, I don't need it. I don't see myself using one for anything other than this.

data.name: 0039 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Right.

data.name: 0040 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato put the application form back where she found it as if she were finished with it.

data.name: 0041 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well then, I've filled out the form, so I'll go borrow the key.

data.name: 0043 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Being seen off by Nagato, I headed over to the teacher.

data.name: 0045 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's great that we could get the key, but we've got a lot of time left over now.

data.name: 0046 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Following Nagato's advice and filling out an application for the teacher...

data.name: 0047 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...made getting permission to use the music room really simple.

data.name: 0048 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I didn't think it'd be this easy to get permission so it's a bit of an anticlimax.

data.name: 0049 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hmm, well we have a bit of time before we need to meet up with the others.

data.name: 0050 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: And it's not often I get time alone with Nagato.

data.name: 0051 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's a chance to talk to her about things I can't say in front of Haruhi.

data.name: 0052 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato, you said singularities are forming within North High, but...

data.name: 0053 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...approximately how many are there?

data.name: 0054 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: A precise value is unmeasurable, and with each passing moment the number is increasing.

data.name: 0055 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Guh, it's increasing? It doesn't seem like there's that many...

data.name: 0056 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: When I look around, everything just seems as normal.

data.name: 0057 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Singularities can only be observed when they appear on the surface.

data.name: 0058 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: You just can't see it with your eyes, but the information couplings' distortion is expanding.

data.name: 0059 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's spreading out that much? If only I could see it...

data.name: 0060 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …Is that what you desire?

data.name: 0061 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Y-yeah, it is.

data.name: 0062 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If I can, I'd like to confirm it with my own eyes.

data.name: 0063 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: If you deem it necessary, I will assist you.

data.name: 0064 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Really? Then definitely, if you don't mind.

data.name: 0065 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Understood. ...Follow me.

data.name: 0066 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato started walking as if to lead me.

data.name: 0067 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Rather than an alien, she had the air of a spirit realm tour guide.

data.name: 0069 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato suddenly stopped in front of the stairs.

data.name: 0070 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hm? Did you find something?

data.name: 0071 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: There.

data.name: 0072 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato slowly lifted her hand and pointed it at…

data.name: 0073 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Guh--!

data.name: 0074 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: A group of 20 centimeter tall rugby club members rushed right past me.

data.name: 0075 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wh-what was that just now? Where did they come from?

data.name: 0076 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I materialized the image produced by the distortion of the information couplings.

data.name: 0077 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: R-right... or rather, where did the image come from?

data.name: 0078 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Haruhi Suzumiya's imagination appeared as a three-dimensional image.

data.name: 0079 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's what Haruhi was thinking about? Why something so uncomfortably hot-looking...

data.name: 0080 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though, it was a great pass and run.

data.name: 0081 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Are there any more of these?

data.name: 0082 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: There are many. In that classroom as well…

data.name: 0083 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Here?

data.name: 0085 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I opened the door to the classroom near where Nagato was pointing and...

data.name: 0086 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wha--!

data.name: 0087 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: For whatever reason a field of watermelon spanned the entire floor of the classroom.

data.name: 0088 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Furthermore, they're perfectly ripe and look delicious.

data.name: 0089 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …Wait, why on earth is there a mountain of watermelon in a classroom?!

data.name: 0090 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: This too is the materialization of Haruhi Suzumiya's image.

data.name: 0091 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I see.

data.name: 0092 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I guess Haruhi desperately wants to eat watermelon then, huh.

data.name: 0093 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Is this real?

data.name: 0094 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I tried to touch the watermelon...

data.name: 0095 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I could feel that familiar smooth skin.

data.name: 0096 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: They aren't real, but are infinitesimally close.

data.name: 0097 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: They have been materialized and are therefore tangible.

data.name: 0098 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …In other words...

data.name: 0099 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Things like this are showing up all over the school?

data.name: 0100 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Based on that mini rugby club, we've practically got the whole school infested with spirits.

data.name: 0102 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I continued to wander the building with Nagato, and I saw all sorts of things...

data.name: 0103 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: A blackboard eraser with legs running about, a window that worked like an automatic door...

data.name: 0104 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...nothing but things that shouldn't be possible.

data.name: 0105 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I know I'm the one who said I wanted to see it, but frankly I've had enough.

data.name: 0106 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: まさか、他のやつもうっかり こんなのを見たりしているのか？

data.name: 0107 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: 通常の人間には目視出来ない

data.name: 0108 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ……良かった

data.name: 0109 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: でもそれも時間の問題

data.name: 0110 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 時間の問題かよ！

data.name: 0111 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: いずれハルヒの目にも留まるように なるってことか？

data.name: 0112 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: そう

data.name: 0113 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: それはマズイ。非常にマズイ

data.name: 0114 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: これがまだ平和的なものならいいが

data.name: 0115 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ハルヒが平和をおびやかすような 想像を始めたら、ヤバすぎるぞ！

data.name: 0116 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: つまり、ハルヒが怪談妄想をすれば それが現実になるってわけか？

data.name: 0117 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: そう いずれそうなる可能性が高い

data.name: 0118 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 長門も冷静に解説している 場合じゃないぞ！

data.name: 0119 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 俺もそこまで北高内が危険地帯に なっているとは思わなかったな

data.name: 0120 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: 今、あなたの横にまた出現した

data.name: 0121 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: な、なにっ？

data.name: 0122 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 言われた方を見ると、消しゴムが 勝手にぴょんぴょんと跳ねていた

data.name: 0123 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ……やけに活きのいい消しゴムだな

data.name: 0124 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 呆れる俺をよそに、長門は 気軽にそいつをつまみ上げる

data.name: 0125 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 長門の指から逃れようと、そいつは ジタバタともがいている

data.name: 0126 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: お座り

data.name: 0127 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 暴れ回る消しゴムにむかって 長門は身も蓋もない命令を下す

data.name: 0128 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: すると消しゴムはピタリとその動き 止めて大人しくなる

data.name: 0129 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: ……いる？

data.name: 0130 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: お、おい、大丈夫なのかよ

data.name: 0131 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: 情報結合は解除した 今はただの消しゴムに戻っている

data.name: 0132 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: そういうことなら、安心か

data.name: 0133 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: しかし、なんで#P05“お座り”#P00なんだ？

data.name: 0134 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: こうすれば、動物は大人しくなると 聞いた

data.name: 0135 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: それは主に犬限定のしつけだと 思うが

data.name: 0136 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 実際、長門なら猛獣の類ですら その一言で従わせるだろう

data.name: 0137 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 無数の獣を従える長門――

data.name: 0138 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: なんとも言えない光景だ

data.name: 0139 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: い、いや、いい

data.name: 0140 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: うかつに見て恐ろしいものだったら 困るしな

data.name: 0141 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: そう

data.name: 0142 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 長門がちょっぴり残念そうに 見えたのは気のせいだろうか

data.name: 0143 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: そうしているうちに、俺の横を 何かが通り過ぎて去っていった

data.name: 0144 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 俺たちには見えてないってだけで 校内中どこもこんな状態なのか？

data.name: 0145 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: 場所によってレベルに差はある

data.name: 0146 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: あなたを案内した場所は 比較的問題ないところだけ

data.name: 0147 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: このレベルで比較的問題ないだと？

data.name: 0148 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ひどい場所っていうのは 想像もしたくないね

data.name: 0149 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ちなみに、今一番マズイのは どこなんだ？

data.name: 0150 (409.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: 音楽室 現在、そこに歪みが集中しつつある

data.name: 0151 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: よりによってそこかよ！ 洒落にならないだろうが

data.name: 0152 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ……やっぱ、放置するわけには いかないだろうな

data.name: 0154 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 長門の表情は変わらないが

data.name: 0155 (409.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: なんとなくそうだと言っている ようにも見えた

data.name: 0156 (409.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ハルヒのところに戻るとするか ……やれやれ

data.name: 0157 (409.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: もらっておく

data.name: 0158 (409.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: いらない

data.name: 0159 (409.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: そっちを見る

data.name: 0160 (409.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 怖いから見ない
